title: Mid-Term Examination Schedule Released
description: The mid-term examination schedule for all undergraduate and postgraduate programs has been published. Students are advised to check the details and prepare accordingly.

title: Library Timings Updated for Winter Break
description: Library hours have been updated for the winter break. Please refer to the notice for detailed timings and availability of services during the holidays.

title: Call for Applications: Research Grant 2025
description: Applications are now open for the University Research Grant 2025. Interested faculty and students are encouraged to apply before the deadline.

title: Guest Lecture on Artificial Intelligence
description: Join us for an enlightening guest lecture on 'The Future of Artificial Intelligence' by Dr. Alan Moore. Registration details are provided in the notice.

title: Campus Placement Drive for Final Year Students
description: A placement drive for final-year students will be held on December 10, 2024. Companies from various sectors will participate. Students are required to register in advance.
